{{Location Intro|'''Albedo's Campsite'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Albedo's Campsite|It|Albedo's Campsite}} is a small laboratory outpost in [[Dragonspine]] used by [[Albedo]]. It is situated in a small cave along the path from the [[Entombed City - Ancient Palace]] to the [[Entombed City - Outskirts]].</p>}}

At the entrance are two lit torches that warm up the player upon approach, along with a cooking pot that can be used for [[cooking]] or processing ingredients. There are two workstations and four shelves, all stacked with research materials. There is also a [[Crafting Bench]] that players can use for [[Alchemy]]. Finally, various barrels and crates are scattered along the outpost, some of which can be investigated for ingredients.
